name: Easyling | Website Translation Technology
author: Easyling

sections.description:
Translate your WordPress website automatically with Easyling cloud-based, SEO friendly website translation solution.

Our plugin enables the integration of Easyling paid translation solutions and provides subdirectory publishing without duplicating your website content or writing anything into your WP database. Our monthly fees include automatic free machine translation for your entire website, without word count limitation. Although it is an automatic machine translation solution by default, you can post-edit your content or even invite your translators to the project to review and post-edit the translations.

www.easyling.com
sections.installation:
Requirements

  1. WordPress 4.7 or later
  2. PHP 7.0 or later.
  3. If you tried other multilingual plugins, deactivate them before activating this plugin, otherwise, you may get unexpected results!

Installation

Install and activate the plugin as usual from the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress or by uploading plugin-zip unzipped folder to the /wp-content/plugins directory.

Setup

You should already have an Easyling project set up for your website and enter your Easyling project code to connect your WordPress site with the Easyling Website Translation Platform.

To learn more visit easyling.com/wp-plugin.

The plugin shows you the target languages that have been set up in your Easyling account and displays the language selector on your page accordingly.
